description.short: Enhance your off-road experience with more power, better gas mileage, and stronger stopping performance with proven engine, fuel delivery, exhaust, and brake upgrades.
description.long: There is nothing more exhilarating than punching the gas and feeling and hearing that engine roar in response. THOR can enhance your off-road experience with more power, better gas mileage, and stronger stopping performance with proven engine, fuel delivery, exhaust, and brake upgrades.

content.sidebar:
Performance upgrades can enhance your build to meet the needs of the vehicle.

Pair up a great sounding exhaust from Magnaflow or Borla, with an air intake kit from AFE Power or K&N. You'll get a boost in power and the sound to match.

Tuning options are available to add additional performance along side your bolt on parts. If you want to go even further, adding a supercharger from Whipple or Magnusen, will increase horsepower and drivability.

With all that extra power, don't forget you'll need to stop! Big brake kits will bring the vehicle back to balance after adding your performance modifications.

Heading out further than expected? Additional fuel tanks or replacement diesel tanks for HD trucks are a must have. We offer the best in-class fuel tanks from Titan Fuel Tanks, Transferflow and ATTA. Fuel and distance issues will be a thing of the past.

With all the performance options available, THOR Off-Road can get you where you want to go, in a hurry and make all the stops!!!

parts.title: Cold Air Intakes
parts.description: Cheap and easy upgrade. Changing the air intake will add felt power and improved response to your ride.

parts.title: Exhaust
parts.description: An upgraded exhaust will make your rig sound better, look great and increase performance, worth every penny!

parts.title: Gear Ratio Upgrades
parts.description: If you're running larger tires, THOR can make a gear ratio change to recover any lost power and torque.

parts.title: Superchargers
parts.description: THOR can find and install an application specific, bolt on supercharger kit for you. Big gains and instant power!

parts.title: Tuners & Programming
parts.description: Looking for plug and play upgrades? THOR sells and installs tuners for your vehicle to increase power, towing and mileage.

seo.title: Texas Engine and Brake Performance Upgrades
seo.description: THOR Off-Road can get your RAM, Chevy and Ford truck to pull harder, stop faster and conserve fuel with top parts from AFE Power, FASS, Flo-Pro Exhaust and Nitro Gears.
